oai_dc:dc.dc:title: J.H. Van Stavoren studio portrait of a young woman, Nashville, Tennessee, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A carte-de-visit studio portrait of a young lady. The verso cites the studio name of J.H. Van Stavoren’s Photographic Gallery of Fine Arts, located at the corner of Cherry and Union Streets in downtown Nashville, Tennessee. Forms part of the Boatright Family Photograph Collection, donated by Linda Ross Lee. 1 carte-de-visite.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Boatright family
J.H. Van Stavoren’s Photographic Gallery of Fine Arts (Nashville, Tenn.)
